dialogue.offer: You've heard the plan. Ask the other survivors for our short, bloody travel once you have accepted my request.
dialogue.accepted: Good. Now go, we can't waste time in our current situation.
dialogue.rejected: Well then... Lets talk about it again later.
dialogue.advice: Those specimens are nasty in close range.
dialogue.success: Thank you. Now we've got more spaces to move around. That being said, tell the others to stay put in this area... they also need your assistance.

description: Collect <color_light_green>4 chunks of steel</color>, <color_light_green>18 scrap metals</color>, <color_light_green>9 electronic scraps</color>, <color_light_green>9 power converters</color>, <color_light_green>5 copper wires</color> and <color_light_green>a broken laser beam turret</color>.

dialogue.offer: I'd like you to retrieve a broken SDP-L1 from the bunker and other essential parts for me to fully repair the turret.
dialogue.accepted: Then go, give them all to me afterwards.
dialogue.rejected: Well then... Lets talk about it again later.
dialogue.advice: If it's too heavy, haul it.
dialogue.success: Good. The process may take an hour. While I'm repairing it, you should talk to others if they need your assistance.

dialogue.offer: So she wants you to clear out the enigma chamber, and you need my help to access that room. But are you ready? You can refuse if it felt like a deathwish.
dialogue.accepted: Let's head to that chamber real quick!
dialogue.rejected: Just ask me again once you're ready to take on.
dialogue.advice: Since this facility have come into chaos, we might see creatures other than them.
dialogue.success: Great! Lets head back to others and see if they need anything else. Enigma chamber is pretty messed up anyway.
dialogue.success_lie: Really? I've come alongside you and yet you lied to something you obviously didn't do?

name.str: Obtain a sample from the shapeshifter

description: Collect a <color_light_green>desaturated resin</color> from a <color_light_red>shapeshifter</color>. Use the tool provided to obtain the required item then bring it back once you've complete the task.

dialogue.offer: You must obtain a sample from that creature using a sampler kit I'm about to provide once you're ready.
dialogue.accepted: Okay, here's the kit. It is set to scan for an enigma specimen. I've sent the coordinates to our guard and talk to him about this, he'll show you the way. But remember, this creature uses deception to hide itself.
dialogue.rejected: Well then... Lets talk about it again later.
dialogue.advice: Be cautious on using the sampler kit, as it scans only the enigma, otherwise you'll waste batteries.
dialogue.success: Well done, survivor. I'll start to identify this resin, and hope it can of good use.

dialogue.offer: She gave me the coordinates as soon as the drone reported her. I'll help you out collecting the sample, and fend off this creature from you. So, are you ready?
dialogue.accepted: Good. The target is not far from here.
dialogue.rejected: Just ask me again once you're ready to take on.
dialogue.success: Wait. It's not the right one... I guess we lost it.
dialogue.success_lie: Really? I've come alongside you and yet you lied to something you obviously didn't do?

description:
"Feed" the bio-organic exoskeleton by activating <color_light_blue>Feed</color> command under the spellcasting tab (undefined by default). Alternatively, you can activate the <color_yellow>Metabolic Distribution</color> bionic, but it is advisable to use it only if you ran out of flesh.

To complete this mission, obtain a <color_light_green>blob glob</color>. It's the main ingredient in creating food for your suit.
